name: NeoGAF Fixed Width Auxiliary For re:GAF
description:
This additional style works with style 13125 and will make the forum's width static.

You can modify the width to your own liking.

Please note that you must match the letters in all categories.

- Example 1 -

Forum: 600px (A)
Post: 430px (A)
Code: 380px (A)
